titles.title: To allow the waiver of certain terms contained in a deed of conveyance to the City of Williams, Arizona.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 5/25/2005--Introduced. Allows the Secretary of Transportation to waive any term contained in the deed of conveyance dated August 13, 1948, by which the United States conveyed lands (H.A. Clark Memorial Field) to the city of Williams, Arizona, for use by the city for airport purposes.
